LanguageData.FollowMe.RejectNotAThing: Can not follow, selection is not a thing, pawn or animal.
LanguageData.CommandAddDangerZoneDesc: Creates an area outside radiation danger radius.
LanguageData.QuarryAlreadyBuilt: Only one quarry is allowed per map.
LanguageData.QRY_Haul: Automatically haul chunks - affects entire quarry
LanguageData.QRY_NotHaul: Drop and ignore chunks - affects entire quarry
LanguageData.ImpassableDoor: The door can be placed if there is a support structure on both sides, and if nothing block pass through the door.
LanguageData.LookDiscA: We found the location of the ship wreck, perhaps spacer could have survived.
LanguageData.DamagedTent: Damaged tent deployed. Some walls will be missing.
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlocked: Tent placement blocked by a item, pawn or a building. Please deploy on a suitable space.
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlockedTree: Tent placement blocked by a tree. Please deploy on a suitable space.
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlockedSimple: Tent placement blocked. Please deploy on a suitable space.
LanguageData.CantPlaceTent: Cannot place a fully damaged tent.
